message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 60% and you can take 40%
I'll offer a 50/50 split. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
Not quite there, Bob. I'd rather have a slightly larger share. Let's negotiate further!
I'll take a slightly larger share this time. You'll get a decent amount too!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. You'll still get a good deal.
Alright, Bob. I think this is a fair deal. I'll take it!
